title: Bug 33635Negation of if pointcut does not work
description: Bug 33635Negation of if pointcut does not work
OB: In "!if(expression)" the negation part is ignored.
SR: I am using beta4.How to reproduce:public class Test {public static void main(String args[]) {}}aspect NotIfBugAspect {before() : execution( main(..)) && !if(true) {System.out.println("NotIfBugAspect message");}} ajc .java java TestNotIfBugAspect messageIf I change the pointcut in before advice to move negation inside if(),everything works fine:aspect NotIfBugAspect {before() : execution( main(..)) && if(!true) {System.out.println("NotIfBugAspect message");}} ajc .java java Test<no output
